Have for sale a T202 Mathewson/Meyers - Just Before the Battle graded PSA 7.  Asking $sold dlvd in US.  Please see scan below. 

Payment - check, postal money order, or Paypal friends & family. Regular Paypal, add an additional 3% to cover the fees. Any questions, please let me know. 

Thanks
DJ
[url]x2drich2000@yahoo.com[/url]
